price: (70) And every soul will be fully compensated [for] what it did; and He is most knowing[1361] of what they do.
arabic: وَوُفِّيَتۡ كُلُّ نَفۡسٖ مَّا عَمِلَتۡ وَهُوَ أَعۡلَمُ بِمَا يَفۡعَلُونَ
footnotes: [1361]- With no need for any record or witnesses, which are but means to establish proof to the soul itself in addition to its own knowledge of what it has done.

version.title: English Translation - Saheeh International
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into English - Saheeh International - Al-Muntada Al-Islami (Islamic Forum)

meta.transliteration: wawuffiyat kullu nafsin mā ʿamilat wahuwa aʿlamu bimā yafʿalūna
